page.shortlink: api collection object from table function
page.description: Populate a collection from a table.

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The fully specified table name with drive and path.

argument.name: keyfieldname
argument.description: The name of the field that provides the collection key value.

argument.name: datafieldname
argument.description: The name of the field that provides the collection element value.

page.discussion: The <COLLECTION>.FROM_TABLE() method populates a collection with data from a table.
page.example: dim customers as U dim t as P dim filename as C t = table.open("customer") filename = t.filename_get() customers.from_table(filename, "customer_id", "lastname") ? customers.get("00000003") = "Rebo"
